pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functional-Based Chain Ladder for Claims Reserving // Functional claims reserving methods based on aggregated chain-ladder data, also known as a run-off triangle, implemented in three nonparametric algorithms (PARALLAX, REACT, and MACRAME) proposed in Maciak, Mizera, and Peta (2022) doi:10.1017/asb.2022.4. Additional methods including permutation bootstrap for completed run-off triangles are also provided.
